mission-soft-landing-repair.instruction: Address code review issues for WO-147: 1) Remove auto-pip install of matplotlib in verify_soft_landing.py, 2) Use getattr with defaults instead of hasattr, 3) Document TD-028 (Order object inconsistency) in TECH_DEBT_LEDGER.md.
mission-soft-landing-repair.title: Repair WO-147: Soft Landing Suite

mission-shock-injector.instruction: Implement the ShockInjector component in modules/simulation to handle TFP drops as per draft_124655.
mission-shock-injector.title: WO-148 Phase 1: Shock Injector

mission-storm-verifier.instruction: Implement the StormVerifier component in modules/analysis to track ZLB, starvation, and debt-to-GDP during shocks, as per draft_124655.
mission-storm-verifier.title: WO-148 Phase 2: Storm Verifier

mission-perfect-storm-run.instruction: Create the standalone execution script scripts/stress_test_perfect_storm.py and generate the final report comparing Phase 23 vs 28.
mission-perfect-storm-run.title: WO-148 Phase 3: Perfect Storm Execution
